data.text: @TorstenBell @adamboultonTABB Not quite as serious as being bombed and shot at?
@TorstenBell Working age households are quite used to falling real wages, it has been the norm for the last 15 years.
@TorstenBell @LuvFB_HateFifa Covid is still rampaging through the population. Ignoring it doesnâ€™t mean it is over.

@TorstenBell Try coming up with some doable suggestions on how we can address the problems we are facing. Many of us are bored with those who constantly moan and push the bad news but seem incapable of putting forward any solutions.

@TorstenBell @hannahmerich Just to be clear we were already heading for a cost of living crisis before war broke out in Ukraine. I worry that your headline will be used as an excuse for other causes of the record inflation that was already happening.
@TorstenBell Which recovery? Covid hospitalisations are increasing in all regions and the effects of longcovid are only starting to be seen in the workforce.
UK faces biggest income squeeze in nearly 50 years https://t.co/bnjhbIikho
